Shin Jisun

Introduction

Eco was a South Korean girl group. The group’s name stands for Erotic Cool Orgasm, which reflects the group’s aim for music that stimulates feelings and intense emotions rather than beauty, dance, or sex appeal.

They made their official debut with the album “Imagine” on January 1, 1996. They eventually disbanded sometime in 2000.

In 2022 the group reformed with Song Ji Young, Kim Jung Ae and Cho Ju Eun to release occasional CCM music to promote faith in God.
